titles.title: A bill to permanently authorize the SBIR and STTR programs.
A bill to permanently authorize the SBIR and STTR programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary: This bill permanently authorizes the Small Business Innovation and Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. The programs are administered by various federal agencies and provide competitive awards for domestic small businesses to conduct research and development projects that have the potential for commercialization.
